info.description:
TornadoPack
+++++++++++

.. contents :: 

Summary
=======

Serve PipeStack applications with `Tornado <http://tornadoweb.org>`_.

Get Started
===========

* Download and install from source

Author
======

`James Gardner <http://jimmyg.org>`_


Changes
=======

0.1.1
-----

2010-11-13
~~~~~~~~~~

* Added missing ``CONTENT_TYPE`` to environ
* Tornado 1.1 supported too

0.1.0
-----

2010-10-13
~~~~~~~~~~

* Updated for HTTPKit 0.2.0

2009-12-23
~~~~~~~~~~

* First version

========
